ygData.subject: Intel F90 compiler work with GCC
ygData.msgSnippet: I just build and installed Cantera 1.60 on Linux. To sucessfully compile the f90 demo with Cantera c++ kernel, your LCXXFLAGS should look like this LCXXFLAGS =

I just build and installed Cantera 1.60 on Linux.
To sucessfully compile th=
e f90 demo with Cantera 
c++ kernel, your LCXXFLAGS should look like this

=
LCXXFLAGS =3D -L$(CANTERA_LIBDIR) -cxxlib-gcc -no-ipo

in the makefile.

Bi=
n
